https://github.com/VladChat/video/releas.title: Paint Peeling on Wood: 180 Grit Wood Paint Prep
https://github.com/VladChat/video/releas.description: Paint Peeling on Wood? Use 180 grit for wood paint prep. Fix common wood prep issues before paint or primer so the finish lays down smooth. Sand with the grain, check your scratch pattern in good light, and clean dust before coating. Wet or dry use. — eQualle

Paint Peeling on Wood: 180 Grit Wood Paint Prep

Paint Peeling on Wood? Use 180 grit for wood paint prep. Fix common wood prep issues before paint or primer so the finish lays down smooth. Sand with the grain, check your scratch pattern in good light, and clean dust before coating. Wet or dry use. — eQualle

https://github.com/VladChat/video/releas.comment_text: Keep the block flat so you don’t dig grooves at the edges. Are you using a sanding block or hand-only?

https://github.com/VladChat/video/releas.title: Orange Peel In Clear Coat? 2000 Grit Wet Sanding Steps
https://github.com/VladChat/video/releas.description: Orange peel in clear coat? Wet sand with 2000 grit to level texture before polishing. Keep the surface wet, use light pressure, crosshatch passes, wipe often, and check reflection under a work light. Wet or dry use. — eQualle
https://github.com/VladChat/video/releas.caption:
Orange Peel In Clear Coat? 2000 Grit Wet Sanding Steps

Orange peel in clear coat? Wet sand with 2000 grit to level texture before polishing. Keep the surface wet, use light pressure, crosshatch passes, wipe often, and check reflection under a work light. Wet or dry use. — eQualle
